body.p: I herewith forward you my bond executed as directed, the bond is amply good. I wish the comssion to cover at least such of the 21st Ky vols as may want to send mony by me, many of the 9th Ky reside in ^this^ county and adjoining ones. I would accept for them, but if it suit the Gov. as well, let the Comssion be alone for the 21st -- these are dangerous times to cary mony. no news here, I do not think the Gurillas will pester this place, as it is now Garissined --
